About

My name is Makdoom Shaikh, I live in Mumbai and I am a self-taught Front End developer. I have often find myself looking for inspiration from coders who don't have any Computer Science degree such as people that have either taught themselves or have gone to bootcamps. This one page website shows the last 30 days record of Corono Virus cases of a particular country in the world. It automatically updated in every two minutes. This project is inspired by Code Explained.
